net.rim.blackberry.api.mail
Class AttachmentHandlerManager

java.lang.Object
  net.rim.blackberry.api.mail.AttachmentHandlerManager

public final class AttachmentHandlerManager
extends Object

The manager class for attachment handling.

Register your AttachmentHandler instance with this class by invoking AttachmentHandlerManager.addAttachmentHandler(net.rim.blackberry.api.mail.AttachmentHandler).

Note: Native attachment handlers on the handheld have priority access to all attachments. Third-party converters cannot override the native platform behaviour.

See Also:
AttachmentHandler
Category:
Signed: This element is only accessible by signed applications. If you intend to use this element, please visit http://www.blackberry.com/go/codesigning to obtain a set of code signing keys. Code signing is only required for applications running on BlackBerry smartphones; development on BlackBerry Smartphone Simulators can occur without code signing.
Since:
BlackBerry API 3.6.0
